text: Hello, I'm using weavejl and can insert an image with "![image name](/path/to/image)", but how can I adjust the size of the image?

elements.text: Hello, I'm using weavejl and can insert an image with "![image name](/path/to/image)", but how can I adjust the size of the image?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

In case anyone needs it: I can center and change the size of the image with:
 ! display("text/html", html"<center> <img src=\"/path/to/image" alt=\"ImageName" width=\"400 \" height=\"400\" /> </center>")
